title: Wiki-Based Collaborative English Writing Proficiency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary proficiency, fundamental document editing skills
context.additional_context: Developing practical writing skills through learner interaction and digital tool integration

learning_goals: Learners can perform a 5-stage (planning-drafting-peer feedback-revision-final publication) collaborative writing process using a wiki platform
Learners possess the ability to improve the accuracy and logical structure of English sentences through peer review
Learners can complete collaborative document-writing projects without time constraints in a digital environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
